actors.name: Maya
actors.purpose: Maya is tasked with analyzing data to identify key performance indicators that correlate with high engagement across various social media platforms. Her objective is to present these findings to the creative team to improve future campaigns. Her decision-making context involves interpreting complex data sets and converting them into actionable insights.
actors.appearance: A woman in her early 30s, of South Asian descent, with medium-length black hair, wearing glasses and business casual attire.

actors.name: Eli
actors.purpose: Eli interacts with Maya by providing context to the creative elements of the social media campaigns. He listens to Maya's data-driven recommendations to adapt the creative strategies for better engagement.
actors.appearance: A gender-neutral person in their late 30s, of mixed ethnicity, with short curly hair, wearing a creative yet professional outfit, often seen with a tablet or design sketches.
